properties.name: Battleship Potemkin (d. Sergei Eisenstein, 1925)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni Our starting place for the course as we consider the famous Odessa steps sequence and the importance of soviet montage cinema (editing) and The Kuleshov Effect.

properties.name: City of God (d. Fernando Meirelles & Katia Lund, 2002)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A useful text to consider the importance of editing as well as Brazilian working class representations in the slums of The City of God.

properties.name: Eraserhead (d. David Lynch, 1977)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A cult classic well known for its use of sound effects and surreal dream moments. Lynch claimed it was based on his time in Philadelphia, hence the position of the marker.

properties.name: Festen (d. Thomas Vinterberg, 1998)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A tough hitting Dogma 95 film which addresses both family abuse and realism

properties.name: Fire (d. Deepa Mehta, 1996)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A film set in modern day Delhi which explores a lesbian relationship between two Indian women. A hugely controversial film, which caused major protests at the time of its release.

properties.name: Inja (d. Steven Pasvolsky, 2001)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni Short morality film set against the unification of South Africa

properties.name: Kandahar (d. Mohsen Makhmalbaf)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A perilous road movie for a Canadian born woman attempting to reach her sister (living in Kabul) before she takes her own life. In the process, she sees a great deal of modern day Afghanistan and its problems.

properties.name: Klaus the Forklift Driver (d. Stefan Prehn & Jorg Wagner)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A short film which engages with a retro visual style, slaughterhouse horror and slapstick, physical comedy.

properties.name: Man With a Movie Camera (d. Dziga Vertov, 1929)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni Widely considered to be one of the most influential films of all time. A masterpiece of editing, showing a day in the city of Odessa (now in modern day Ukraine) with almost every editing trick pioneered in this film.

properties.name: My Dad is 100 Years Old (d. Guy Madden, 2005)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A short film which addresses Isabella Rossellini\'s relationship with her father as well as the cinematic ideology of Alfred Hitchcock, David Selznick and Federico Fellini.

properties.name: Sin City (d. Frankk Miller & Robert Rodriguez, 2005)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A modern neo-noir with interesting use of \'colour.\' Check out Helen Lee\'s editing in \'Gweilo for a good example of the Sin City in effect.

properties.name: The Bicycle Thieves (d. Vittorio De Sica, 1948)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni The Neo-Realist classic will form part of your study of script writing as we consider the work of Cesare Zavattini

properties.name: The Bronze Screen (d. Nancy De Los Santos et al)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni

properties.name: The Fall (d. Tarsem Singh, 2006)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni An aesthetically stunning film which will form part of the focus of script-writing, narrative structure and cinematography.

properties.name: The Motor Cycle Diaries (d. Walter Selles, 2003)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A road movie about an idealistic young man (the future Che Guevara) and his hedonistic colleague as they embark on a epic road trip through S.America. (Argentina, Chile, Peru & Venezuela)

properties.name: Wasp (d. Andrea Arnold, 2003)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A short film in the style of British Naturalism. It provides a slice of life a/c from the perspective of a young single mother with 4 kids.

properties.name: Water (d. Deepa Mehta, 2005)
properties.description: Posted by Sisalumni A film set in the city of Varanasi about an ashram and subsequently clearly addressing female representation in India (1938) and today.
